welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mezitli, Turkey! Get ready to experience the charm and beauty of this coastal city, known for its stunning beaches, rich history, and delicious cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Mezitli has to offer.

restaurants.name: Fırat Usta Kokoreç
